a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Difference between male and female life expectancy, United Kingdom,
Female minus male life expectancy, at ages 0, 15, and 45. Estimates are based on period life tables and are expressed as
expected age at death, not as years left to live.
Difference in life expectancy at birth
Difference in life expectancy at age
Difference in life expectancy at age
Data source: Human Mortality Database (2018) and others
